title: Montezuma Castle National Monument: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions            Verde Valley Archaeology Center The Verde Valley Archaeology Center preserves archaeological sites and collections, and makes them available for research and viewing. Explore American Indian history in the Verde Valley through the science of archaeology!         V Bar V The V Bar V Heritage Site, run by the Coconino National Forest, is the largest known petroglyph site in the Verde Valley, as well as being oneof the best-preserved. Plus, they're very close to Montezuma Well!         Fort Verde Experience life through the eyes of a frontier soldier at Fort Verde State Historic Park. The fort was a base for General Crook's U.S. Army scouts and soldiers in the 1870s and 1880s. Dr. Mearns, the fort's surgeon, made some of the first extensive excavations at Montezuma Castle.
